name: Ballet of Pain 2
description:
Rain hell in this bullet shoot-em-up! 

Controls:
Press k to kill self in case the game soft-locked
R - Slow Reload / Restart game
rotate mouse 360 degrees around player - Fast Reload
left mouse button - shoot 1 bullet
right mouse button - shoot 10 bullets

Scores available on Newgrounds.com

Play Ballet of Pain 2 on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/850351
Play Ballet of Pain 1 here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/850002
